short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage text snippets from any website with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save important text from any webpage with a single keyboard shortcut. Perfect for research, study notes, and collecting useful information.

Features:
• Quick capture with Ctrl+Shift+S (Cmd+Shift+S on Mac)
• Organize with custom titles
• Search through your snippets
• Copy, edit, or delete with one click
• Saves source URLs for reference
• Clean, modern interface

Ideal for students, researchers, writers, and anyone who wants to save text for later use. Works offline and stores data locally for privacy.
